region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Mouth

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T02',
                can_use_projectile or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 00 T02 Unbar')

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby

locations.Nut Pot: can_dive or is_child or logic_jabu_scrub_jump_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots)
locations.Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Compass Chest:
here(can_use(Slingshot)) and 
                (can_dive or is_child or logic_jabu_scrub_jump_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots))

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Pit Room:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T03',
                here(can_dive or is_child or logic_jabu_scrub_jump_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots))
                or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 01 T03 Unbar')
exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Water Switch Room South: 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Water Spouts' and transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T15', True)
exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby East Hall:
at('Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby Upper', True) or can_use(Hover_Boots)
                or ('Jabu Jabus Belly Room 01 Upper Cow' and can_use(Hookshot))

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby Upper
Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby East Hall
Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby East

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby East Hall:
'Jabu Jabus Belly Red Tentacle' or
                damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Pit Room

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T16', True) or
                transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T17', True) or
                transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T19', True)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Pit Room North

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T05',
                'Jabu Jabus Belly Room 02 Cow' or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 02 T05 Unbar')

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Pit Room:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T19', True)
                or (False and (transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T16', True)
                    or transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T17', True)))

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit North

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Pit Room: False and transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T21', True)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit East

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Water Switch Room North:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T13',
                at('Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit North', True or can_press_floor_switch)
                or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 03 T13 Unbar')
exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Pit Room: False and transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T20', True)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit West

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Pit Room: False and transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T18', True)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit West Hall

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit West:
'Jabu Jabus Belly Green Tentacle' or
                damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit Southwest

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit:
'Jabu Jabus Belly Red Tentacle' or
                damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)
exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit Side Room: 'Jabu Jabus Belly Red Tentacle' and transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T14', True)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Post-Miniboss Room

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Lobby Upper:
((can_use(Slingshot) and can_use(Boomerang))
                or (can_climb(120) and can_hold_down_switch))
                and transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T09', True)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Pre-Boss Room

exits.Barinade Arena:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T01',
                here(can_use(Slingshot) or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 05 T01 Unbar')

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Miniboss Room

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Miniboss Room Upper: Bring Ruto and kill Big Octo

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Miniboss Room Upper

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Post-Miniboss Room:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T04',
                can_use(Slingshot) or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 06 T04 Unbar')

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways E: here(has_fire_source or ('Jabu Jabus Belly Room 11 Enemies' and can_use(Sticks)))

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways W

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways:
'Jabu Jabus Belly Blue Tentacle' or
                (damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love))

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways E
Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways NW

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways:
'Jabu Jabus Belly Blue Tentacle' or
                (damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love))

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways NE
Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways N

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly North Chamber: 'Jabu Jabus Belly Room 07 Rocks' and transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T07', True)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly North Chamber
Jabu Jabus Belly East Chamber
Jabu Jabus Belly West Chamber
Jabu Jabus Belly Northeast Chamber

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Branching Hallways NE:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T08',
                'Jabu Jabus Belly Room 11 Enemies' or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 11 T08 Unbar')

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Northwest Chamber

locations.Jabu Jabus Belly MQ GS Tailpasaran Room:
here((Bombs and can_press_floor_switch) or has_bombchus)
                and can_use(Boomerang) or can_use(Hookshot)

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit Side Room

locations.Jabu Jabus Belly MQ GS Invisible Enemies:
(can_use(Boomerang) or can_use(Hookshot)) and
                ((logic_lens_jabu_mq or can_use(Lens_of_Truth)) or
                can_use(Hover_Boots) or (mm_ice_arrows and can_use(Ice_Arrows)))

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Under Pit Southwest:
transition('Jabu Jabus Belly T14',
                can_swim or 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Room 13 T14 Unbar')

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Water Switch Room North
Jabu Jabus Belly Water Switch Room

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Water Switch Room South: (can_press_floor_switch or can_climb(100)) and 'Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Water Spouts'

region_name: Jabu Jabus Belly Water Switch Room South Hall
